Title: Object: Le Départ pour l'Égypte
Description: The flight into Egypt: Joseph holds a lantern and walking stick at the doorstep of his house, next to a donkey, at right; Mary and the infant Jesus stand at the doorway; after Alexandre Bida; illustration from 'Les Saints Evangiles' (Paris: Hachette, 1873), Vol. I, No. 5. 1873 Etching
Curator's comments: From 'Les Saints Evangiles' (Paris: Hachette, 1873, 2 volumes), with fourteen plates engraved by Bracquemond, after Alexandre Bida. All plates were published except one. The illustrations do not bear inscriptions, although the endpapers to each volume bear captions.
Bibliographic references: Beraldi 1885-92 / Les Graveurs du dix-neuvième siècle (464)
IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (349)
